org.knime.core.util

Class ThreadUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.util.ThreadUtils

  • public final class ThreadUtils
extends Object
    This class contains utility methods for handling NodeContexts with new threads.
    Since:
    2.8
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ThreadUtils.CallableWithContext<V>
      Extension of Callable that ensures that the NodeContext, which was present during creation of the object, is set when the ThreadUtils.CallableWithContext.call() method is called.
      static class  ThreadUtils.RunnableWithContext
      Extension of Runnable that ensures that the NodeContext, which was present during creation of the object, is set when the ThreadUtils.RunnableWithContext.run() method is called.
      static class  ThreadUtils.ThreadWithContext
      Extension of Thread that ensures that the NodeContext, which was present during creation of the object, is set when the ThreadUtils.ThreadWithContext.run() method is called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V> Callable<V> callableWithContext(Callable<V> callable)
      Creates a Callable that carries the current NodeContext with it.
      static <V> Callable<V> callableWithContext(Callable<V> callable, boolean logUnnecessaryCalls)
      Creates a Callable that carries the current NodeContext with it.
      static ExecutorService executorServiceWithContext(ExecutorService executorService)
      Wraps the given executor service and ensures that the runnable is run within the context of the caller of the various execute, submit and invoke methods.
      static Executor executorWithContext(Executor executor)
      Wraps the given executor and ensures that the runnable is run within the context of the caller of Executor.execute(Runnable).
      static Runnable runnableWithContext(Runnable runnable)
      Creates a Runnable that carries the current NodeContext with it.
      static Runnable runnableWithContext(Runnable runnable, boolean logUnnecessaryCalls)
      Creates a Runnable that carries the current NodeContext with it.
      static Thread threadWithContext(Runnable runnable)
      Creates a new thread the executed the given runnable in the NodeContext of the caller.
      static Thread threadWithContext(Runnable runnable, String name)
      Creates a new thread the executed the given runnable in the NodeContext of the caller.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • runnableWithContext

        public static Runnable runnableWithContext(Runnable runnable)
        Creates a Runnable that carries the current NodeContext with it. The context is set before the original Runnable is executed and removed again in the end. This is useful if a Runnable is executed by a new thread or an ExecutorService where the executing thread does not have a node context.
        Parameters:
        runnable - any runnable
        Returns:
        a runnable that wraps the original runnable and sets the node context

      • runnableWithContext

        public static Runnable runnableWithContext(Runnable runnable,
                                           boolean logUnnecessaryCalls)
        Creates a Runnable that carries the current NodeContext with it. The context is set before the original Runnable is executed and removed again in the end. This is useful if a Runnable is executed by a new thread or an ExecutorService where the executing thread does not have a node context.
        Parameters:
        runnable - any runnable
        logUnnecessaryCalls - true if unnecessary calls to this method should be logged. A call is unnecessary if the runnable is already a ThreadUtils.RunnableWithContext or if no NodeContext is available
        Returns:
        a runnable that wraps the original runnable and sets the node context

      • callableWithContext

        public static <V> Callable<V> callableWithContext(Callable<V> callable)
        Creates a Callable that carries the current NodeContext with it. The context is set before the original Callable is executed and removed again in the end. This is useful if a Callable is executed by a new thread or an ExecutorService where the executing thread does not have a node context.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the Callable's return type
        Parameters:
        callable - any callable
        Returns:
        a Callable that wraps the original Callable and sets the node context

      • callableWithContext

        public static <V> Callable<V> callableWithContext(Callable<V> callable,
                                                  boolean logUnnecessaryCalls)
        Creates a Callable that carries the current NodeContext with it. The context is set before the original Callable is executed and removed again in the end. This is useful if a Callable is executed by a new thread or an ExecutorService where the executing thread does not have a node context.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the Callable's return type
        Parameters:
        callable - any callable
        logUnnecessaryCalls - true if unnecessary calls to this method should be logged. A call is unnecessary if the runnable is already a ThreadUtils.RunnableWithContext or if no NodeContext is available
        Returns:
        a Callable that wraps the original Callable and sets the node context

      • executorWithContext

        public static Executor executorWithContext(Executor executor)
        Wraps the given executor and ensures that the runnable is run within the context of the caller of Executor.execute(Runnable).
        Parameters:
        executor - any Executor
        Returns:
        an Executor that wraps the original executor

      • executorServiceWithContext

        public static ExecutorService executorServiceWithContext(ExecutorService executorService)
        Wraps the given executor service and ensures that the runnable is run within the context of the caller of the various execute, submit and invoke methods.
        Parameters:
        executorService - any ExecutorService
        Returns:
        an ExecutorService that wraps the original executor service

      • threadWithContext

        public static Thread threadWithContext(Runnable runnable)
        Creates a new thread the executed the given runnable in the NodeContext of the caller.
        Parameters:
        runnable - any runnable.
        Returns:
        a new thread

      • threadWithContext

        public static Thread threadWithContext(Runnable runnable,
                                       String name)
        Creates a new thread the executed the given runnable in the NodeContext of the caller.
        Parameters:
        runnable - any runnable.
        name - the new thread's name
        Returns:
        a new thread
